scripts.example-Run: npx spago build -x dev.dhall && (npx parcel serve --open -p 1337 --out-dir dev test/Test/Run/index.html & npx spago -x dev.dhall build --watch)
scripts.example-TransformPath: npx spago build -x dev.dhall && (npx parcel serve --open -p 1337 --out-dir dev test/Test/TransformPath/index.html & npx spago -x dev.dhall build --watch)
